document.docAuthor: Nguyen, Tung T., Nguyen, Anh D., Tran, Binh T. T. & Blakemore, Robert J.
document.masterDocTitle: A comprehensive checklist of earthworm species and subspecies from Vietnam (Annelida: Clitellata: Oligochaeta: Almidae, Eudrilidae, Glossoscolecidae, Lumbricidae, Megascolecidae, Moniligastridae, Ocnerodrilidae, Octochaetidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A comprehensive checklist of earthworm species and subspecies from Vietnam (Annelida: Clitellata: Oligochaeta: Almidae, Eudrilidae, Glossoscolecidae, Lumbricidae, Megascolecidae, Moniligastridae, Ocnerodrilidae, Octochaetidae)

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Amynthas papulosus—
Sims & Easton 1972 : 181
;
Easton, 1981 : 56
;
Blakemore 2002 : 180
.

Amynthas papulosus papulosus—
Sims & Easton 1972 : 236
;
Blakemore 2007a : 76
; Blakemore 2008.

Pheretima composita
Gates, 1932 : 430
, synonymized by Gates (1972) .

subSubSection.paragraph:
Examined material.
3 C ( SORC-V.155.02 ) fruit tree garden, Hoai Nhon , Binh Dinh ,
16/4/1995
, coll. Huynh Thi Kim Hoi
;
2 C and 1 A ( SORC-V.155.03 ) Binh Hiep , Binh Son , Quang Ngai ,
15/4/1995
, coll. Huynh Thi Kim Hoi
;
4 C and 1 A ( SORC-V.155.07 ) cassava garden, Tien Phuoc , Tien Ky , Quang Nam ,
28/1/1998
, coll. Pham Thi Hong Ha
.
Distribution. Cosmopolitan species; also recorded from Myanmar , Thailand , Indonesia ( Sumatra ), China , Taiwan ( Gates 1972 ; Easton 1981 ; Blakemore 2002 ).

Remarks. The species seems to be widely distributed in Vietnam , except in the southernmost part. Thai (1983) proposed a new subgenus Terrata of the genus
Pheretima
, and placed the species under the new subgenus.
